name: Jab Out
description:
This is a simple fighting game with only one attack players move their character with A, D or <-, ->.  To attack P1 uses spacebar and P2 uses Right CTRL.

Jab out is a tech demo seeking to capture the essence of footsies and experiment with the most basic fighting game systems.  The simple controls allow the game to be picked up by anyone with great ease and the PvP option allows players to challenged friends via couch co-op.
